name: I Wanna Be the Rusty
description:
Play as a cute little fox named Rusty, and jump around on blocks.

I promised I'd start working on a game, and I've come up with this in a month!

All criticism appreciated :)

Press R to restart if you get stuck.

Level Theme:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/RoccoW/Weeklybeats_2014/Weeklybeats_2_-_Danie...

Cover art done by: @oh_hecko (Instagram)
